title: Hack of Vitalik Buterin's X Account Leads to $691K Stolen
description: Hackers who took control of Ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin's X account have stolen more than $691,000 after posting a malicious phishing link that gained access to people's wallets.

title: Facebook’s Former Head of Crypto on Bitcoin’s Role in Global Payments
description: David Marcus, an American entrepreneur, has a rich history in the fintech space. He was the co-creator of Diem, a cryptocurrency project initiated by Facebook, and has served as the president of PayPal as well as Head of Messenger and Head of Novi at Meta. As of May 2022, Marcus is the co-founder and CEO […]

title: Cardano Price Prediction 2023-2032: Is ADA a good investment?
description: Cardano Price Predictions 2023-2032 Yet again, the crypto market is toiling in the abyss of uncertainty following the series of delisting fuelled by the ongoing United States SEC crackdown on major crypto platforms. Basically, it’s crypto winter in the summer as it stands. How do Cardano Price Prediction analysts steer in this turbulent crypto weather? ... Read more

title: Crypto Whales Are Choosing Anarchy (ANA) Over Near Protocol and CurveDAO
description: As the bear market continues to wreck the price of cryptocurrencies, investors are leaving the big guys – Near Protocol (NEAR) and CurveDAO (CRV) for safety. Both NEAR and CRV struggle to keep up with the downtrend despite recent developments in their respective ecosystem. Amidst these circumstances, a new hope has emerged in Anarchy (ANA) [...]

title: SOL, MATIC Could Be on the Brink of Another Fall, Here’s Why
description:
Despite enduring torrid periods over the past few weeks, the crypto market may be on the verge of another nosedive. This is because FTX, the exchange that brought the market to its knees in 2022, is getting ready to liquidate some of its assets, and Solana (SOL) and Polygon (MATIC) are part of it. According […]

The post SOL, MATIC Could Be on the Brink of Another Fall, Here’s Why appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Crypto Hinting at Rallies Amid Unpredictable Market Conditions, According to Santiment
description:
New data from crypto analytics firm Santiment reveals that digital assets are hinting at rallies despite market conditions being rife with uncertainty. According to Santiment, “bear market” mentions on social media platforms heavily outweigh those of a bull market, causing the spread of fear, uncertainty and doubt (FUD). However, the market intelligence firm says that […]

The post Crypto Hinting at Rallies Amid Unpredictable Market Conditions, According to Santiment appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
